translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The forward and reverse order of the three-factored table of contents, the three-factored table of contents in brief, the three-factored table of contents in detail

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽17.6. Kusalattika, Pītittika🔽Kusalaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.🔽Kusalaṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati🔽hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  kusalattika pītittika  kusalam pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca saṅkhitta hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate terasa  kusalam sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati  hetu paccayā pañca saṅkhitta hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi
translated: The profitable triad, the joy triad

original: …pe… avigate terasa.🔽Kusalaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati🔽hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi🔽…pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: pe a vigate terasa 🔽kusalam upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammo uppajjati 🔽hetu paccayā pañca saṅkhitta hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi 🔽pe a vigate terasa
translated: With respect to the profitable, joy-accompanied, idea: There is an unprofitable, joy-accompanied idea that is related to it by conascence cause … by prenascence cause … by postnascence cause … by kamma cause … by nutriment cause … by faculty cause … by absorption cause … by path cause … by association cause … by dissociation cause … by presence cause … by absence cause … by non-causation cause.
